alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cattaraugus County through 315 PM EDT... At 236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Scandia, or 10 miles west of Allegany State Park, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Allegany State Park, Onoville and Allegheny Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
